attributes.additional_details: Anthony Doyle, who thinks banger racing should be put in his place, bangers are not stolen to race, and look at the death rate between all other motorsport and banger racing, you will be in shock that banger racing is very safe compared to the others,, come on doyle, see you at a track.

rejection.details:
We cannot publish an e-petition which only directs remarks at the creator of a published e-petition.

Howwever, an e-petition has been published in favour of keeping banger racing so you may wish to sign that.
